index.title: BASIS-64 - Dayak Kenyah Translator
index.metaDescription: BASIS-64 provides the first Dayak Kenyah translator in the world and is equipped with NLP technology and artificial intelligence.
index.metaKeywords: basis-64, basis64, basis-64 computer, basis64 computer, computer, komputer, basis64 tools, tools, basis64 equipment, equipment, Dayak Kenyah translator, Dayak Kenyah, Kenyah dictionary, Kenyah language, Dayak translator, Dayak language translator, Dayak Kenyah dictionary
index.contentDescription: BASIS-64 provides a variety of complete facilities, including an NLP (Natural Language Processing) based Dayak Kenyah translator. Some premium features require payment to access. Log in with your Google account to get a 1-day free trial. Press CTRL + SHIFT + R simultaneously to reload this website.

price.title: Start Subscription
price.contentDescription: You can activate your account by subscribing according to the package you choose.
price.hematDescription: Activation at the most affordable price. Suitable for short-term needs and trying out BASIS-64 premium features.
price.hematFeature1: Unlimited access to the AI NLP-based Dayak Kenyah translator for one week
price.remixDescription: The medium option for those who need longer access without frequent renewals. Balanced between duration and price.
price.remixFeature1: Unlimited access to the AI NLP-based Dayak Kenyah translator for one month
price.phoenixDescription: The package with the longest duration. Ideal for loyal users who want long-term activation within one year.
price.phoenixFeature1: Unlimited access to the AI NLP-based Dayak Kenyah translator for one year

payment.title: Activation & Payment
payment.contentDescription: Make payments online via QRIS. Screenshot and send your proof of payment via the website admin's WhatsApp.
payment.step1Description: Scan the QRIS below using the DANA or Gopay application to make a payment.
payment.step2Description: Contact the admin via WhatsApp and send proof of payment and tell the admin your email so they can activate it.
payment.step3Description: Scan the QRIS below using the DANA or Gopay application to make a payment.
payment.step3Button: Click here to view account profile

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.contentDescription: We really appreciate your input and suggestions and let us know if there are bugs on this website.
feedback.name: Name

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: Is my account safe on BASIS-64?
faq.a1: Yes, we guarantee the security of your account during data exchange. All information sent to our servers is encrypted end-to-end using AES for data encryption and RSA for the key exchange process.
faq.q2: Does the admin or owner of this website know my account password?
faq.a2: No, we as the website owner cannot read your account password. All passwords are stored in encrypted form using a secure algorithm and cannot be viewed by anyone, including admins.
faq.q3: What if I forget my account password?
faq.a3: If you forget your account password, you can change your password by clicking 'Forgot Password' on the login page.
faq.a4: Currently, we use NLP (Natural Language Processing) technology to translate Dayak Kenyah more accurately, with up to 90% accuracy. This technology helps the system understand the structure and meaning of sentences, so translations are not only word-for-word, but also according to context. That way, users can get translation results that are more natural, easy to understand, and close to the original meaning.
faq.q5: How do I make a payment?
faq.a5: You can make payments via QRIS or in cash by meeting the admin directly. You can get automatic activation after sending proof of payment if you pay via QRIS. You can contact the admin via WhatsApp if there are problems with activation.
faq.q6: Is the BASIS-64 Dayak Kenyah translator free?
faq.a6: No, the BASIS-64 Dayak Kenyah translator is not free. Users need to subscribe to access this feature. See the available package options here. However, BASIS-64 occasionally opens free access during certain promotional periods — but this is very rare.

about.title: About Us
about.contentDescription: We are a software company and the world's first Dayak Kenyah language translator service provider that uses NLP (Natural Language Processing) which enables accurate translation because our translator can translate sentences and even change word order, such as 'I am a teacher' to 'ca guru keq' or 'have you eaten' to 'lepe ne ikoq uman'. Our translator is different from previous generation translators that only replace simple word-for-word.

forgot-password.title: Forgot Password
forgot-password.contentDescription: If you forget your password, we will send an OTP to your Gmail account. Make sure you check your entire inbox, including the spam or junk folder.
forgot-password.login: Already have an account? Login
forgot-password.OTP_REQUESTED: You have previously requested an OTP, check the inbox on your Gmail account.
forgot-password.TRY_ERROR: Brute force detected, please try again later.
forgot-password.OTP_NOT_SAME: OTP does not match, please try again.
forgot-password.UNKNOWN_ERROR: OTP expired, request a new OTP to recover your account.
forgot-password.remainingTime: Wait <SECONDS_PLACEHOLDER> seconds to request a new OTP
forgot-password.confirmPassword: Password and confirm password must be the same.
